com.io7m.r2.core

Class R2AmbientOcclusionBufferPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.r2.core.R2AmbientOcclusionBufferPool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    R2RenderTargetPoolType<R2AmbientOcclusionBufferDescriptionType,R2AmbientOcclusionBufferUsableType>, R2RenderTargetPoolUsableType<R2AmbientOcclusionBufferDescriptionType,R2AmbientOcclusionBufferUsableType>

    public final class R2AmbientOcclusionBufferPool
extends Object
implements R2RenderTargetPoolType<R2AmbientOcclusionBufferDescriptionType,R2AmbientOcclusionBufferUsableType>

    A pool of ambient occlusion buffers, with a configurable soft and hard size.

    Objects within the pool will occasionally be discarded so that the storage size of the pool stays below the soft limit. The size of the pool will never be allowed to grow beyond the hard limit, and attempting to do this will result in exceptions being raised.

      • get

        public R2AmbientOcclusionBufferUsableType get(com.io7m.jcanephora.texture_unit_allocator.JCGLTextureUnitContextParentType tc,
                                              R2AmbientOcclusionBufferDescriptionType desc)
        Description copied from interface: R2RenderTargetPoolUsableType

        Get a render target from the pool, allocating a new one if necessary. The returned render target is guaranteed to be different from any other that has been returned from this call and not yet returned with R2RenderTargetPoolUsableType.returnValue(JCGLTextureUnitContextParentType, R2RenderTargetUsableType) .

        Specified by:
        get in interface R2RenderTargetPoolUsableType<R2AmbientOcclusionBufferDescriptionType,R2AmbientOcclusionBufferUsableType>
        Parameters:
        tc - A texture unit context
        desc - A render target description
        Returns:
        A (possibly new) render target that must be returned after use
        See Also:
        R2RenderTargetPoolUsableType.returnValue(JCGLTextureUnitContextParentType, R2RenderTargetUsableType)
